save_uploaded_file ( $  key,
array $  options = array() 
)

save_uploaded_file Saves an uploaded file to the specified directory, returns filename

USAGE: try { $filename = save_uploaded_file("input-name", array("is_image" => true, "resize" => array("width" => 100, "height" => 100))); } catch (Exception $e) { echo $e->getMessage(); }

Exceptions:
InvalidFileSystemPathException
Returns:
(string|false) $filename if success, false if couldn't move file to location
Author:
Matt Brewer
